trans-unit.source: Provides information about the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref> event that occurs one or more times when a user drags a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 相关信息提供<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref>发生一个或多个时间，当用户拖动事件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>使用鼠标控件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventArgs"></xref> class.
The horizontal change in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> position since the last <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 中的水平更改<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>自上次操作后的位置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: The vertical change in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> position since the last <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 中的垂直更改<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>自上次操作后的位置<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the horizontal distance that the mouse has moved since the previous <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref> event when the user drags the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> control with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 获取鼠标自上一已移动的水平距离<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref>事件，当用户拖动<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>使用鼠标控件。

trans-unit.source: A horizontal change in position of the mouse during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 在拖动操作期间的鼠标位置中的水平更改。

trans-unit.source: Converts a method that handles the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref> event to the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventHandler"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: 将转换处理的方法的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventHandler"></xref>类型。

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the `genericHandler` as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventHandler>.
trans-unit.target: 此实现将强制转换`genericHandler`作为一种<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventHandler>。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragDeltaEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Gets the vertical distance that the mouse has moved since the previous <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref> event when the user drags the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref> with the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 获取鼠标自上一已移动的垂直距离<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.DragDelta"></xref>事件，当用户拖动<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb"></xref>使用鼠标。

trans-unit.source: A vertical change in position of the mouse during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: 在拖动操作期间的鼠标位置垂直变化。
